Title: I Love You
Writer: Marco Ferreri (original idea), Enrico Oldoini (scenario & adaptation and dialogue), Didier Kaminka (scenario & adaptation and dialogue), Marco Ferreri (scenario & adaptation and dialogue)
Actors: Christopher Lambert, Eddy Mitchell, Flora Barillaro, Agnès Soral
Plot: Michel is a bored lonely cheap-thrills-seeker. Everything changes when he finds an unusual bobble head doll in the shape of a pretty woman that can say "I love you" and falls in love with it to the point of obsession.
